Sentencas: Yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) has widely been used as an electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks.
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The microstructure and properties of YSZ related to the fabrication process are discussed in this paper.
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: For the named two-step sintering process, uniform and hexagonal grains with a size of 1-4 mu m were obtained from the adobe following tape calendaring (TCL).
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: Elliptical and hexagonal grains with a size of 0.4-3 mu m were obtained from the adobe of tape casting (TCS) using the three-step process.
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivities of YSZ with different grain sizes were measured via the four-probe DC technique and grain conductivities and grain boundary conductivities of YSZ were investigated by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: YSZ electrolytes with a grain size of 0.1-0.4 mu m had the highest electrical conductivity in the range of 500-1000 degrees C, especially at medium and low temperatures 550-800 degrees C. As the YSZ grain size becomes small, the thickness of the intergranular region decreased greatly.
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The YSZ electrolytes with sub-micrometer grain sizes, high ion conductivity and low sintering temperatures are important to the electrode- supported SOFC, on which the dense YSZ electrolyte films are optimized at 10 mu m. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V.
Titulo: Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs
Fabrication, microstructure and properties of a YSZ electrolyte for SOFCs
